channel.title: Arma 2 (Dayz)
channel.description:
I'm sure there's been topics about this game before but,
Is anyone into playing this game? If so, I've just started playing if you want to team up or something! If you don't know what Dayz is, it's a mod or expansion for Arma 2, with a huge continent free roam map, with zombies and other players, and basically you just try to survive. It's a lot of fun though!
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=mOB7YGgREFg
Check it out! You're gonna need Arma 2 to play (computer game, by the way) And there are means of getting it free, if you catch my drift, and the Dayz mod, which is free.

item.title: Arma 2 (Dayz)
item.dc:creator: @Nothing1 -Nothing
item.description:
@Nothing1 wrote:

R.I.P DayZ.

There’s too much hackers now which just do ‘kill all players’ script and switch servers untill they are empty.
So untill they do something about it, it’s a dead game.

Read full topic

item.title: Arma 2 (Dayz)
item.dc:creator: @TabbyKiller TabbyKiller
item.description:
@TabbyKiller wrote:

Already a topic but no one talks about it anymore for some reason. But what you could do is turn this into a show your DayZ character. I’ll be taking screen shots later.

Read full topic
